Summary: Circle with 4 lights on the bottom in the shape of a square,1 yellow,1 green,1blue,1red
divs: Sighting Details It was May 1st after 5am, sunday morning and I was on my way home. I was driving on the highway and started looking up at the sky and all of a sudden I noticed a red ball of light. I wasnt sure what it was, I thought I was crazy, then out of the corner of my eye about 50 feet away from it was a circle, saucer like object with four different colored lights underneath. One yellow, one green, one blue, one red. I knew it couldnt be life flight, they only have two lights close together and are not shaped like circles. Neither are regular planes. As soon as I had seen it I just watched in amazement, not to mention I was driving and almost went off the road from gazeing on this flying thing in the sky. I had never felt so excited and so Frightened in all my life. I couldn't believe what i was seeing! I kept driving and looking at it as much as I could but lost sight of it over the moutains.

There were no other sightings in Williamsport on or around May 1st 2011
